content:
This PR contains some small lemmas in topology that will be used in the proof (#17285) that two complex embeddings of a field define the same place iff they are equal or complex conjugate. It has already been reviewed and modified accordingly.

It will need to be signed off by someone from mathlib-AG since it modifies some files in algebraic_geometry to resolve some timeouts issues.
Thanks for the ping. I left a little comment.
